actions.name: Motor Drive

cost.trigger: The user is hit by an Electric-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by an Electric-Type attack.

Effect: The user takes no damage from the triggering attack and is unaffected by the triggering attack's effect. Then the user raises their SPD Stage by +1 for 5 Activations.

system.description:
